dw:transform-message.doc:name: Convert SAP response to Salesforce Account
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- payload.BAPI_CUSTOMER_GETLIST.tables.ADDRESSDATA map { //removed single quote as the Salesforce query will then crash Name : $.NAME replace /(\')/ with " ", BillingCity : $.CITY, BillingCountry : $.COUNTRY, BillingPostalCode : $.POSTL_COD1, BillingStreet : $.STREET, Phone : $.TEL1_NUMBR }

sfdc:query-single.query: SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Name = '#[payload.Name]'
sfdc:query-single.doc:name: Query Salesforce for current Account
